name: Gincana
description:
Don't you think skiing vacations feel kind of bleak without chocolate sweets and late-night word games challenges? Don't worry, we got it fixed for you. 

Gincana is a peculiar skiing game set in the Italian Alps. What really matters in a Gincana match are not skiing stunts or record times, but the words you can compose with the tiles you collect on the snow track. 

Challenge your friends or play solo on the three different skiing tracks that make up a Gincana challenge, and try to collect more chocolate sweets than your opponents.

In singleplayer mode, you'll be facing Walter Croccante, multiple times Gincana world heavyweight champion. His witty humor will accompany you through the three difficulty levels you can unlock.

Gincana supports both keyboard and controller, and can be played in English or Italian.

Follow Villadelfina for new games and updates!
